name: Burt and Martyn
description:
Burt and Martyn are attached together by their brotherly bond (and also a chain sometimes)

AD/Left Right to move, Space to Jump, Q to swap guys, W to attach/detach, E/R to change chain size, F as Burt (the big guy) to pick up and throw Martyn

Made by Aevo55, Dexor, and OrangeLube

Art by OrangeLube

Sound by Orangelube's sister and EpicPharaoh
